MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G13 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Temple Gardens and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.22am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.28pm on Thursday 14th January 2021.
